span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要显示 ，必须将其添加到 或 。In order for a to be displayed, you must add it to a or . 若要创建子菜单，可以将 对象添加到父 的 属性。To create submenus, you can add objects to the property of the parent . 类提供属性，使您能够配置菜单项的外观和功能。The class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item. 若要在菜单项旁显示复选标记，请使用 属性。To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the property. 您可以使用此功能来标识在互斥菜单项列表中选择的菜单项。You can use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items. 例如，如果您有一组菜单项用于设置 控件中的文本颜色，则可以使用 属性来识别当前选定的颜色。For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a control, you can use the property to identify which color is currently selected. 属性可用于定义可按下以选择菜单项的键盘组合。The property can be used to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item. 对于在多文档界面（MDI）应用程序中显示的 对象，您可以使用 方法将的 MDI 父级的菜单与其子窗体的菜单合并，以创建合并菜单结构。For objects displayed in a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) application, you can use the method to merge the menus of an MDI parent for with that of its child forms to create a consolidated menu structure. 由于不能同时在多个位置重复使用 （例如在 和 中），因此可以使用 方法创建 的副本，以便在其他位置使用。Because a cannot be reused in multiple locations at the same time, such as in a and a , you can use the method to create a copy of a for use in another location. 事件使您能够在显示菜单之前执行任务。The event enables you to perform tasks before a menu is displayed. 例如，可以为此事件创建事件处理程序，以根据代码的状态显示或隐藏菜单项。For example, you can create an event handler for this event to display or hide menu items based on the state of your code. 当用户将鼠标指针放在菜单项上时，可以使用 事件来执行任务，例如，提供应用程序菜单项的详细帮助。The event enables you to perform tasks such as providing detailed help for your application's menu items when the user places the mouse pointer over a menu item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建窗体的菜单结构。The following code example creates a menu structure for a form. 示例代码添加了一个用于表示顶级菜单项的 ，向其中添加了一个子菜单项用于选择字体大小，然后将两个子菜单项添加到了应用程序中表示大和小字体选择的菜单项。The example code adds a to represent the top-level menu item, adds a submenu item to it for selecting a font size, and then adds two submenu items to that menu item that represent large and small font choices in an application. 该示例要求有一个名为 `mainMenu1` 的 对象和一个名为 `menuItem1`、`menuItem2`、`menuItem3`和 `menuItem4`的四个 对象。The example requires that there is a object named `mainMenu1` and four objects named `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `text` 参数为菜单项指定标题时，还可以通过在要用作访问键的字符前放置 "&" 字符来指定访问密钥。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' character before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要在 "File" 中将 "F" 指定为访问键，请将菜单项的标题指定为 "& 文件"。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 可以使用此功能为菜单提供键盘导航。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 将 `text` 参数设置为 "`-`" 会导致菜单项显示为分隔符（水平线）而不是标准菜单项。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 ，它指定菜单项在构造时的标题。The following code example creates a that specifies the caption of the menu item at the time it is constructed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `text` 参数为菜单项指定标题时，还可以通过在用作访问键的字符前放置 "&" 来指定访问密钥。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要在 "File" 中将 "F" 指定为访问键，请将菜单项的标题指定为 "& 文件"。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 可以使用此功能为菜单提供键盘导航。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 将 `text` 参数设置为 "`-`" 会导致菜单项显示为分隔符（水平线）而不是标准菜单项。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. 此外，还可以使用此构造函数指定一个委托，该委托将处理所创建菜单项的 事件。In addition, you can use this constructor to specify a delegate that will handle the event for the menu item being created. 传递给此构造函数的 必须配置为调用可处理 事件的事件处理程序。The that you pass to this constructor must be configured to call an event handler that can handle the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 对象，该对象具有指定的标题和一个连接到将处理菜单项的 事件的事件处理程序的 委托。The following code example creates a object with a specified caption and an delegate connected to an event handler that will handle the event for the menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `text` 参数为菜单项指定标题时，还可以通过在用作访问键的字符前放置 "&" 来指定访问密钥。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要在 "File" 中将 "F" 指定为访问键，请将菜单项的标题指定为 "& 文件"。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 可以使用此功能为菜单提供键盘导航。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 将 `text` 参数设置为 "`-`" 会导致菜单项显示为分隔符（水平线）而不是标准菜单项。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. 使用 `items` 参数可以分配一组菜单项来定义此菜单项的子菜单。The `items` parameter enables you to assign an array of menu items to define a submenu of this menu item. 数组中的每一项还可以有一个分配给它的菜单项的数组。Each item in the array can also have an array of menu items assigned to it. 这使您可以创建完整的菜单结构，并将其分配给菜单项的构造函数。This enables you to create complete menu structures and assign them to the constructor for the menu item. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有指定标题的对象，该事件处理程序连接到将处理子菜单项数组中的每个菜单项的事件的方法。The following code example creates an object with a specified caption, an event handler connected to a method that will handle the event each menu item in an array of submenu items. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将 属性与菜单中的其他菜单项结合使用，以提供应用程序的状态。You can use the property in combination with other menu items in a menu to provide state for an application. 例如，您可以对一组项中的菜单项设置一个选中标记，以确定要为应用程序中的文本显示的字体大小。For example, you can place a check mark on a menu item in a group of items to identify the size of the font to be displayed for the text in an application. 你还可以使用 属性来标识一组互斥菜单项中的选定菜单项。You can also use the property to identify the selected menu item in a group of mutually exclusive menu items. > [!NOTE] > 对于顶级菜单项，不能将此属性设置为 `true`。This property cannot be set to `true` for top-level menu items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性来提供应用程序中的状态。The following code example uses the property to provide the state in an application. 在此示例中，一组菜单项用于指定 控件中的文本的颜色。In this example, a group of menu items are used to specify the color for the text in a control. 提供的事件处理程序由三个菜单项的 事件使用。The event handler provided is used by the event of three menu items. 每个菜单项指定文本颜色、`menuItemRed` （红色）、`menuItemGreen` （绿色）或 `menuItemBlue` （蓝色）。Each menu item specifies a text color, `menuItemRed` (Red), `menuItemGreen` (Green), or `menuItemBlue` (Blue). 事件处理程序确定单击的菜单项，将复选标记置于所选菜单项上，并更改窗体 控件的文本颜色。The event handler determines which menu item was clicked, places a checkmark to the selected menu item, and changes the text color of the form's control. 该示例要求将 命名空间添加到了此代码所放置到的窗体中。The example requires that the namespace has been added to the form that this code is placed in. 该示例还要求将 添加到此示例代码所在的窗体中，该窗体名为 `textBox1`。The example also requires that a has been added to the form that this example code is located in that is named `textBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来获取子菜单的 对象。You can use this property to obtain the object for a submenu. 可以将此属性返回的 对象转换为 的对象，以对其进行操作。You can cast the object returned by this property to a object to manipulate it. ## Examples 在此示例中，您将创建一个主菜单和一个顶级菜单项，`menuItem1` （`File`）。In this example, you create a main menu and a top-level menu item, `menuItem1` (`File`). 还会创建两个菜单项，`menuItem2` （`New`）和 `menuItem3` （`Open`），然后将它们添加到 `menuItem1`的菜单项列表。You also create two menu items, `menuItem2` (`New`) and `menuItem3` (`Open`), and add them to the menu item list of `menuItem1`. 然后，查看 `menuItem3` 是否有父菜单，该菜单为 true，并在 messagebox 中显示此父菜单的信息。Then you check to see if `menuItem3` has got a parent menu, which is true, and display the information of this parent menu in message box. 此示例需要你创建了一个名为 `Form1`的 。This example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此菜单通过代码激活菜单项，而无需传递任何事件信息。You can use this menu to activate a menu item through code without passing any event information. 例如，如果想要根据应用程序中发生的操作激活菜单项，则可以为该 调用 方法。For example, if you want to activate a menu item based on an action that occurs in your application, you can call the method for that . ## Examples 在此示例中，通过使用 `PerformClick` 方法以编程方式单击菜单项。In this example you programmatically click a menu item by using the `PerformClick` method. 首先，创建一个主菜单（`mainMenu1`）并向其中添加两个菜单项，`menuItem1` （`File`）和 `menuItem2` （`Edit`）。First, you create a main menu (`mainMenu1`) and add to it two menu items, `menuItem1` (`File`) and `menuItem2` (`Edit`). 当单击菜单项时，还可以使用 事件将数据发送到事件处理程序。You also use the event to send data to the event handler when a menu item is clicked. 然后，使用 `PerformClick` 方法单击 "`File`" 菜单项。Then you use the `PerformClick` method to click the `File` menu item. 启动应用程序时，将激活 `File` 菜单项，并在其中包含文本 "文件菜单" 被单击的消息框。When you start the application, the `File` menu item is activated, and a message box that contains the text "The File menu is clicked." 出现在屏幕上。appears on the screen. 该示例要求您已创建一个名为 `Form1`的 。The example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[PerformClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PerformClick/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PerformClick/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PerformClick/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许你引发 事件，而无需将任何事件信息传递给事件处理程序。This method allows you to raise the event without passing any event information to the event handler. ## Examples 在此示例中，通过使用 `PerformSelect` 方法以编程方式选择菜单项。In this example you programmatically select a menu item by using the `PerformSelect` method. 首先，创建一个主菜单（`mainMenu1`）并向其中添加两个菜单项，`menuItem1` （`File`）和 `menuItem2` （`Edit`）。First, you create a main menu (`mainMenu1`) and add to it two menu items, `menuItem1` (`File`) and `menuItem2` (`Edit`). 选择菜单项时，还可以使用 事件将数据发送到事件处理程序。You also use the event to send data to the event handler when a menu item is selected. 然后，使用 `PerformSelect` 方法选择 `File` 菜单项。Then you use the `PerformSelect` method to select the `File` menu item. 启动应用程序时，将选择 "`File`" 菜单项，并在其中包含文本 "文件菜单已选中" 的消息框。When you start the application, the `File` menu item is selected, and a message box that contains the text "The File menu is selected." 出现在屏幕上。appears on the screen. 该示例要求您已创建一个名为 `Form1`的 。The example requires that you have created a named `Form1`. summary.span: 在显示菜单项的菜单项列表之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a menu item's list of menu items is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当菜单项具有子菜单项显示时，才会发生此事件。This event only occurs when a menu item has submenu items to display. 在显示菜单项之前，可以使用此事件处理程序根据应用程序的状态添加、删除、启用、禁用、选中或取消选中菜单项。You can use this event handler to add, remove, enable, disable, check, or uncheck menu items based on the state of your application before they are displayed. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件来确定是否在显示为剪切、复制和删除操作提供支持的 对象之前是否启用它们。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether objects that provide support for cut, copy, and delete operations are enabled before the menu they are displayed in is shown. 该示例确定是否 `textBox1`、窗体上的 控件是否已启用、是否具有输入焦点，以及是否在启用 对象之前选择了文本。The example determines if `textBox1`, a control on the form, is enabled, has input focus, and has text selected before enabling the objects. 此示例要求创建了三个名为 `menuCut`、`menuCopy`和 `menuDelete` 的 对象。This example requires that three objects are created named `menuCut`, `menuCopy`, and `menuDelete` have been created. [!code-cpp[MenuItem.Popup#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuItem.Popup/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MenuItem.Popup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuItem.Popup/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MenuItem.Popup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuItem.Popup/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，通过该值指示 （如果已选中）是否显示单选按钮而不是选中标记。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the , if checked, displays a radio-button instead of a check mark.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于一组菜单项，复选标记不一定表示一组互斥状态。Check marks do not necessarily imply a mutually exclusive state for a group of menu items. 您可以使用此属性向用户指示菜单项的选中标记是互斥的。You can use this property to indicate to the user that the check mark of a menu item is mutually exclusive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性更改应用程序的状态。The following code example uses the property to change the state of an application. 在此示例中，提供了一组菜单项，这些菜单项用于指定 控件中的文本的颜色。In the example, a group of menu items are provided that are used to specify the color for the text in an control. 在此示例中，提供的事件处理程序由三个菜单项的 事件使用。In the example, the event handler provided is used by the event of the three menu items. 每个菜单项指定颜色、`menuItemRed`、`menuItemGreen`或 `menuItemBlue`。Each menu item specifies a color, `menuItemRed`, `menuItemGreen`, or `menuItemBlue`. 事件处理程序确定单击的菜单项，将复选标记置于所选菜单项，并更改窗体的 控件的文本颜色，名为 `textBox1`。The event handler determines which menu item was clicked, places a checkmark to the selected menu item, and changes the text color of the form's control, named `textBox1`. 该示例还使用 "" 属性来演示如何使用单选按钮来显示互斥的菜单项。The example also uses the property to demonstrate how a radio-button check is used to show menu items that are mutually exclusive. 此示例要求将 命名空间添加到包含此代码的窗体中。This example requires that the namespace has been added to the form that contains this code. [!code-cpp[Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MenuItem.RadioCheck Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户将鼠标指针放在菜单项上时，通常会引发此事件。This event is typically raised when the user places the mouse pointer over the menu item. 用户通过使用键盘滚动到菜单项来突出显示菜单项时，还可能会引发事件。The event can also be raised when the user highlights a menu item using the keyboard by scrolling to the menu item with the arrow keys. 可以使用此事件在应用程序状态栏中显示与此菜单项相关的详细帮助字符串。You can use this event to display a detailed help string pertaining to this menu item in an application's status bar. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果 的 属性包含任何项，则不会引发此事件。If the property for the contains any items, this event is not raised. 父菜单项不会引发此事件。This event is not raised for parent menu items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类的 事件将帮助文本分配给 控件的 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event of the class to assign help text to a of a control. 此示例要求将 名为 `menuOpen`、`menuSave`和 `menuExit` 的对象添加到窗体上的 控件中。This example requires that objects named `menuOpen`, `menuSave`, and `menuExit` are added to a control on a form. 该示例还要求将名为 `statusBar1` 控件添加到窗体中。The example also requires that a control, named `statusBar1` has been added to the form. 控件应包含一个 。The control should contain a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 为菜单项指定标题时，还可以通过在用作访问键的字符前放置 "&" 来指定访问密钥。When you specify a caption for your menu item, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 例如，若要在 "File" 中将 "F" 指定为访问键，请将菜单项的标题指定为 "& 文件"。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 可以使用此功能为菜单提供键盘导航。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 如果将此属性设置为 "`-`"，则会将菜单项显示为分隔符（水平线）而不是标准菜单项。Setting this property to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个菜单项，设置标题，分配快捷键，使菜单项可见，并显示菜单项的快捷键显示方式。The following code example creates a menu item, sets the caption, assigns a shortcut key, makes the menu item visible, and shows the shortcut key display for the menu item. 该示例要求创建了名为 `menuItem1`的 。The example requires that a has been created that is named `menuItem1`.
